Hi

I need to isolate modules. So - if they crash they should be re-loaed automaticlly. Is this possible with PRISM?

 

Thanks

Michael

Hi Michael,

Based on my understanding currently this is not supported in Prism, as explained on Chapter 4: Modular Application Development of the Prism documentation, modules can only be loaded once, and cannot be unloaded; which seems to be necessary to achieve the scenario you described.

You could also find more information about this in the following threads:

  • Prism Unload Module
  • Loading and unloading modules on demand

Regards,
